channel.title: Yell command easy please help!
channel.description: CAN ANYONE REPLY A ::YELL COMMAND FOR MASSACRED 317 SOURCE PLEASE? I GET 100 ERRORS EVERY TIME I MAKE IT.

item.title: Yell command easy please help!
item.dc:creator: @chippeh chippeh
item.description:
@chippeh wrote:

jamessemple:

get new source. yours is shit

It’s not the source, it’s the coder. Telling someone to get a new source is kinda lame, after they work on it for a while it becomes a waste to just get a new one. It’s better to just fix the bugs on the type of source you are use to.

and I might post my Yell command for you when I get home, the PROPER way

Read full topic

item.title: Yell command easy please help!
item.dc:creator: @riku9182 riku9182
item.description:
@riku9182 wrote:

Try this one, Its from Pk Planet and it works fine for me XD

[code]
if (command.startsWith(“yell”) && command.length() > 5 && playerRights >= 0) {
String titles = “”;

            if (playerRights == 1) {
                titles = "@whi@[Moderator]-";
            }
            if (playerRights == 2) {
                titles = "@red@[Admin]-";
            }
            if (playerRights == 3) {
                titles = "@yel@[Owner]- ";
            }
            if (donator == 1 && playerRights == 0) {
                titles = "@blu@[Donator]-";
            }
            if (donator == 1 && playerRights == 1) {
                titles = "@whi@[Mod/Donator]-";
            }
            if (donator == 1 && playerRights == 2) {
                titles = "@red@[Admin/Donator]-";
            }
            if (donator == 1 && playerRights == 3) {
                titles = "@yel@[Owner/Donator]-";
            }
            if (donator == 2 && playerRights == 2) {
                titles = "@blu@[Super Donator]-@gre@ ";
            }
            if (donator == 2 && playerRights == 1) {
                titles = "@whi@[Mod/Super Donator]- ";
            }
            if (donator == 2 && playerRights == 2) {
                titles = "@red@[Admin/Super Donator]- ";
            }
            if (donator == 2 && playerRights == 3) {
                titles = "@blu@[Owner/Super Donator]-@gre@ ";
            }
            yell(titles + "" + playerName + ": "
                    + command.substring(5));

}[/code]

Read full topic

item.title: Yell command easy please help!
item.dc:creator: @RaZoR36 RaZoR36
item.description:
@RaZoR36 wrote:

Sigh why do we just criticise him? Why not help him:

[code]
} else if (command.startsWith(“yell”) && command.length() > 5) {

        command.substring(5).replaceAll("no-ip", "imgay");
        command.substring(5).replaceAll("servegame", "imgay");
        command.substring(5).trim();

        if (muted == 1) {
            sendMessage("You are muted and cannot yell!");
        } else {
            PlayerHandler.messageToAll = playerName + " - "
                    + command.substring(5);
        }[/code] Depending on where you put it you might have to take away the } else or just else.

Read full topic

item.title: Yell command easy please help!
item.dc:creator: @h7333 h7333
item.description:
@h7333 wrote:

[code] if (command.startsWith(“talk”) && command.length() > 5 && playerRights >= 0) {
String titles = “”;

            if (playerRights == 1) {
                titles = "[Moderator] ";
            }
            if (playerRights == 2) {
                titles = "[Administrator] ";
            }
            if (playerRights == 3) {
                titles = "[Owner] ";
            }
	if (donator == 1) {
                titles = "[Donator] ";
            }
	if (playerRights == 0) {
                titles = "[Player] ";
            }
	if (playerName.equalsIgnoreCase("michael")) {
                titles = "[Owner]";
            }
            talk(titles + "" + playerName + ": "
                    + command.substring(5));
    }[/code]

that any help if not then idk:s

Read full topic
